main event: A balloon exploded and crashed over a mountain, leading to the collection of wreckage by a forest ranger.
interesting points: The balloon measured 50 ft in length and 20 ft in diameter,The envelope of the balloon was made of cellophane and had just exploded,Incident observed by a ranger at an altitude of approximately 15,000 ft,There were reports of vapour trails and an explosion before the object disintegrated,Four parachutes were reported to have fallen from the wreckage.
